dataValueTemplate.annotation: SELECT count(*) FROM openmrs.obs o1,openmrs.obs o2 where o1.comments like 'a_%' and o2.comments like 'c_%' and Substring(o1.comments,2,length(o1.comments)-2) = Substring(o2.comments,2,length(o2.comments)-2) and o1.encounter_id = o2.encounter_id and o2.value_coded = 1395 and o1.voided = 0 and o2.voided = 0 where Date(o1.value_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(o1.value_datetime) < :endOfPeriod and o1.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) FROM openmrs.obs o1,openmrs.obs o2 where o1.comments like 'a_%' and o2.comments like 'c_%' and Substring(o1.comments,2,length(o1.comments)-2) = Substring(o2.comments,2,length(o2.comments)-2) and o1.encounter_id = o2.encounter_id and o2.value_coded = 129218 and o1.voided = 0 and o2.voided = 0 where Date(o1.value_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(o1.value_datetime) < :endOfPeriod and o1.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) FROM openmrs.obs o1,openmrs.obs o2 where o1.comments like 'a_%' and o2.comments like 'c_%' and Substring(o1.comments,2,length(o1.comments)-2) = Substring(o2.comments,2,length(o2.comments)-2) and o1.encounter_id = o2.encounter_id and o2.value_coded = 125872 and o1.voided = 0 and o2.voided = 0 where Date(o1.value_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(o1.value_datetime) < :endOfPeriod and o1.location_id = :locationId
